contentJson: ["The reason I left you in Crete was that you would set in order what was unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: The reason I left you in Crete was that you would set in order what was unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: An elder must be blameless, the husband of but one wife, having children who are believers and who are not open to accusation of indiscretion or insubordination.

text: As God’s steward, an overseer must be above reproach—not self-absorbed, not quick-tempered, not given to drunkenness, not violent, not greedy for money.

contentJson: ["Instead, he must be hospitable, a lover of good, self-controlled, upright, holy, and disciplined."]
name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Instead, he must be hospitable, a lover of good, self-controlled, upright, holy, and disciplined.

contentJson: ["He must hold firmly to the faithful word as it was taught, so that he can encourage others by sound teaching and refute those who contradict it."]

contentJson: ["But as for you, speak the things that are consistent with sound doctrine."]

text: But as for you, speak the things that are consistent with sound doctrine.

text: Older men are to be temperate, dignified, self-controlled, and sound in faith, love, and perseverance.
